name: Virtual Dream Center 2.0
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 2.0" features the following virtual exhibitions :

ELISE VANDEWALLE : “LES CHASSEURS D’OMBRE”
DEIRDRE SARGENT : “MASSACHUSETTS”
ZOE WALSH : “PERISCOPE”
SARAH NEFISSA BELHADJALI : “COLLECTION CENTER”
MARGUERITE LI-GARRIGUE : “MAREE”
LARA MORCIANO : “EMBEDDING TANGLES”
JESSICA BOUBETRA : “THE MARBLE INDEX”

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
